title: This Matchmaking is shit
body:
Diamond last season

1800MMR game, WIN
next game: 1500MMR match, LOSS
next game: 1800MMR match, WIN
next game: 1600MMR match, LOSE
next game: 1780MMR match, WIN
next game, 1500MMR match, LOSE

What the fuck is this MM?

I win a game vs people of my skill, so it makes me vs people with exponentially less skill than I, gives me a retarded team, then the next game gives me a (harder enemy team after losing) decent matchup? What the fuck is this?

I win, so it vs's me vs slightly worse people with completely retarded teammates
I lose, so it decides I need to vs harder players, 

Diamonds+ are easy as fuck for me to vs. Golds give me cancer because they pick stupid shit like -

The one fucking game I first picked Janna and got a Gragas ADC with Illaoi top. What am I supposed to do with Janna in that shit? Knock them out of Illaoi ult? Peel for Gragas? This shit gives me AIDS. 

The other game I had TF Jungle.

Another game I had a Gold 5 on my team first picking Vayne vs Diamond Caitlyn


Fuck this matchmaking, seriously.

replies.body:
So you just assume your team has to build around your comp? That's a huge mistake. Janna and Illaoi could make a great combo, imo. If she ults you can knock someone up, slow them and keep them trapped essentially while she dishes out damage. IF she's about to die, you can shield her while she gets some tentacle slams off restoring health. 

Gragas ADC doesn't really work, but that has more to do with the individual as opposed to his rank or mmr.

> [{quoted}](name=the Anarchit3cht,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=j9uiJ8AX,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-01-01T05:38:57.502+0000)
>
> So you just assume your team has to build around your comp? That's a huge mistake. Janna and Illaoi could make a great combo, imo. If she ults you can knock someone up, slow them and keep them trapped essentially while she dishes out damage. IF she's about to die, you can shield her while she gets some tentacle slams off restoring health. 
> 
> Gragas ADC doesn't really work, but that has more to do with the individual as opposed to his rank or mmr.

Graves Jungle
Illaoi top
Gragas ADC
Anivia Mid
 
Janna supp

So the 0 range team that cannot take towers, dragon, baron, or initiate a fight in any other way than a Gragas ult.
Illaoi is shit in that comp
Gragas is shit in that comp
Graves is shit in that comp
Janna is shit in that comp
Anivia is shit in that comp

There's hard CC other than Janna and Gragas, and Gragas has to be melee while also being ADC.
No real tank, full ap Gragas and bruiser Illaoi
No damage other than the burst from Gragas R and Anivia EQ
No siege
Worthless team comp. I would have picked veigar or some shit if they were gonna pick gragas ADC

> [{quoted}](name=A Bloo Banana,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=j9uiJ8AX,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-01-01T05:36:24.343+0000)
>
> Duo+ Queue.
> 
> 
> ^ That is all.

Can't find anybody to duo with when everybody is doing stupid shit like Gragas ADC
No i mean it's because of duos, along with the stupid picks. people will duo with someone an entire tier below them which destroys the mmr balance
Where are you getting the MMR ratings from?
